pullrequest.title: Add coverage testing through appveyor and codecov

content.raw:
yeah, in their C example they pass the `-coverage` flag to clang

* https://github.com/codecov/example-c/blob/master/.travis.yml#L4

I tried with appveyor since we already have that integrated. Oh well.

I'll decline this for now.

The web interface is really nice though:

* https://codecov.io/gh/Homebrew/brew/
* https://codecov.io/gh/Homebrew/brew/tree/master/Library/Homebrew
